head.title: Remove Metadata from {{FileFormatUp}} Files in {{EnvName}}
head.description: Cross-platform {{EnvName}} metadata API to hide and remove metadata fields from {{FileFormatUp}} files. Supports XMP, EXIF, IPTC, ID3, and more.

header.title: Remove {{FileFormatUp}} Metadata in {{EnvName}}
header.description: Remove metadata properties from {{FileFormatUp}} and other popular document, image, and multimedia file formats using {{ProdFullName}} API.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}} API

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is an advanced solution for managing metadata fields. Easily read, add, update, delete, find, compare, exchange, and export metadata from images and documents without using any external software. Remove metadata from Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, OneNote, Visio, Project, PDF, AutoCAD, ZIP, audio, and video files, along with many other features.

formats.title: Removing Metadata from Other File Formats
formats.description: Multi-format document and image metadata removal API for {{EnvName}}. Retrieve and remove metadata from popular file formats.

examples.comment_3: Remove a custom property by name

steps.title: Steps for Removing Metadata from {{FileFormatUp}} in {{EnvName}}

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}}) makes it easy for {{EnvName}} developers to delete metadata from {{FileFormatUp}} files in a few simple steps.
content.step_1: Load the {{FileFormatUp}} file to be updated.
content.step_2: Pass a search predicate to the {{TextRemoveProperties}} method.
content.step_3: Check the number of properties that were removed.

more_features.title: Manage Document Metadata with Ease
more_features.description: Our solution simplifies metadata management. Easily access, edit, and update document properties to keep files organized and searchable.

feature_1.title: Effortless Metadata Control
feature_1.content: Quickly retrieve and process document metadata. Gain insights into properties like author, creation date, and more.

feature_2.title: Simple Metadata Editing
feature_2.content: Directly edit document metadata. Update properties for better organization, searchability, and accuracy.

feature_3.title: Powerful Metadata Management
feature_3.content: Perform advanced operations on document metadata. Easily add custom properties, remove unnecessary data, and ensure consistency.

code_1.title: Clear ZIP Archive Metadata
code_1.content: This code snippet shows how to remove user comments from a ZIP archive.
code_1.comment_1: Load the archive file for processing
